title: Where is a good site to find a pen pal? - Quora

response.answer_text: I been penpalling since 1999. I have 7 of the 9 penpals I made since then and we are good and close. I use InterPals Penpals - 's Profile as of 2007 tho I only met one friend there to last until now. But it is a great site if you look closely and have a good profile. It is not about finding; it is about keeping it up. Actually, my niece, 22 is looking for female letter pals if you are interested by any chance.

I recently created a PenPal Website Home - PenPal Globe and i have had visitors say that it easy to use and has a good design. Check it out for yourself… Also, a bonus for the website is we give free travel every two months to one user. We randomly select a user from the top 100 active users and provide them a trip with a value of $1,700 to a destination of their choice….
